The media suite No. 1 in sales. More than 350 million copies sold worldwide.

New in this version:
* NEW! System restore and disaster recovery BackOnTrack 4
* Create custom soundtracks SmartSound Sonicfire Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Pro *

Minimum system requirements:
* An Internet connection for product activation at the time of installation
* Microsoft Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® 7 Home Premium, Professional or Ultimate (32 - or 64-bit), Microsoft Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Windows Vista ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ SP2 (32 - or 64-bit), Windows Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® XP SP3 (32 - or 64-bit)
* For copying and recording data and audio capture and editing: Pentium 4 Intel Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® 1.6 GHz or AMD equivalent, 512 MB RAM for Windows XP and 1 GB RAM for Windows Vista and Windows 7. For editing and conversion of video and DVD playback, processor Intel Pentium 4 2 GHz or AMD equivalent 1 GB RAM. Multicore processor recommended 2 GB of RAM minimum.
* DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card 1024x768 with a color setting of at least 16-bit sound card, DVD-ROM drive
* ATI Stream Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® and CUDA ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ only available with activated AMD ATI graphics cards and NVIDIA Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® CUDA Stream.
* Hard drive with a minimum of 3 GB of free space for installation. Copying DVD and BD, as well as video editing and may require large amounts of disk space, up to tens of GB
* Windows Media Player 9, 10, 11 or 12.
* Internet Explorer 7 or 8.
* Requires an Internet connection to register and update the product and some features. The user must pay the costs of Internet applications.
* QuickTime Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Player, version 7 for some functions.
* ITunes Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® version 8 for some functions.
* For video capture: IEEE 1394 FireWire card compatible with OHCI (for use with DV camera) or Roxio Video Capture USB analog sources
* The Blu-ray playback requires additional accessories can be purchased at www.roxio.com.
* The configuration of the functions of media access server require always-on PC connected to a cable network.

3D
* Includes glasses red / cyan 3D. For other 3D formats supported, the necessary hardware is the responsibility of the user.
* Input formats 3D video above or below the full height and average height, full width and half-width side to side, red / cyan anaglyph, RealD, Fuji FinePix Real 3D
* Video output formats 3D red / cyan anaglyph, full width and half-width side to side, above or below the full height and average height, RealD.


Input formats:
* Video: AVI, DV, HDV, DV-AVI, MPEG-1/2/4, MPEG2-HD, DVD-Video, IFO / VOB, XviD, DVR-MS, TiVo, ASF, MOV, WMV, QuickTime, 3GP , MPEG2 Transport Stream, AVC (H.264), AVCHD
* Audio: Audio CD, MP3, WAV, WMA, Dolby Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Digital AC-3, AAC, Ogg Vorbis, FLAC, M4A, MP4, Playlists (WPL, ASX, M3U, PLS, XSPF)
* Image: MPO, JPG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, GIF


Output formats:
* Video: AVI, DV-AVI, HDV, MPEG-1/2/4, MPEG2-HD, WMV, WMV HD, AVC (H.264), MP4, 3GP
* Audio: MP3, WAV, WMA, Dolby Digital AC-3, Ogg Vorbis, FLAC, MPEG-1 / 2, M4A, M4B AAC, Playlists (M3U, PLS, XSPF, WPL)
* Image: JPG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, GIF
* Video disc formats: DVD, Video CD (VCD), Super Video CD (SVCD), Mini DVD.


Recordable Formats:
* CD-R/RW, DVD R / RW, DVD-R/RW, DVD-R DL, DVD R DL, DVD-RAM, BD-R/RE, BD-R/RE DL
* Disc image formats: read ISO, C2D, BIN / CUE and GI; write ISO and GI
